item.title: Complete ability mechanics compendium (organized by type)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Social

Chat and vote manipulation/reading

Existing

Talking to a target - Psychic and Prince
Talking to someone random - Noble
Public announcement - Psychic and Noble
Hidden whispers - Psychic, noble, Apostle and Butler
Anonymous whispers - Butler
Reading whispers - noble, Possessor, and apostle
Preventing whispers - Butler
Talking to dead - Priest, Reaper and Psychic
Mason chat - Noble
Preventing votes - Noble and Princess/Duchess
Preventing talking - Assassin, Illusionist, Alchaholic and Reaper
Preventing hearing - Reaper, Illusionist, Alchaholic and Alchemist
Redirecting votes - Noble, Apostle and Psychic
Gaining additional votes - King, Apostle and Noble
Provent someone from being voted - King, Fool and Noble
Reading journals - Marchal, Noble and apostle
Hearing Prince chat - Marchal and Prince
Tampering with Ability’s - Illusionist, Apostle, MM, Ritualist, Scorned and Fool
Removing chat log - Illusionist
Redirecting whispers - Illusionist
Tampering with class reveals - Herbalist and Possessor
Fake notifications - Herbalist and Acolyte
Forced speach - Scorned and Fool
Lover status - Noble

Possible New

Silencing night chats
Reading Ability results
Erasing journals
Tampering with journal reveals
Class reveals
Forced whispers
Seeing votes early
Hearing evil chat
Invisible votes
False votes (people see someone voting for someone when they aren’t)
Neighborhood chats
False conversions (Unseen/Cult thinks you are converted/evil when you are not)
Fake conversions (You think you are Unseen/Cult when you are not)

.

Support

Protection, immunity’s and buffs

Existing

Status removal - Phys, Alch, Reaper, Soulcatcher
Status immunity - Phys, Alch
Night immunity (non-passive) - King, Alch, Priest, Hunter, Drunk, Alchaholic
Heal (night immunity without attacker feedback, Uneffected by anti-night immunity) - Phys, Alch, Reaper, Soulcatcher
Conversion immunity (not on neuts/king) - Prince, Priest, Drunk, CW, Sheriff, Paladin
Occupy immunity (non-passive) - Court Wizard, Enforcer, Ritualist
Redirect immunity (non-passive) - Court Wizard, Enforcer, Ritualist
Attack interception - Knight, Enforcer, Drunk
Tamper immunity (guard against mind warp) - Court Wizard
Day ability immunity - Court Wizard
Visit Prevention - Merc, Poacher, Sage, Court Wizard, Fool, Prince
Visit Hiding - Inquis
Anti healing - Reaper, Enforcer
Anti Night immunity - Reaper, Enforcer, Ritualist
Rampage mod - Ritualist, Sorcerer
Resurrection - Priest, Phys
Royal Blood - Prince, Princess, Noble, Drunk, Converted versions of those

Possible New

Killer Visit Prevention (only stops killing ability’s from visiting)
Guaranteed correct results
Granted Royal blood
Anti-Visit prevention
Anti-Anti effects (You could keep adding anti’s forever)
Temporary multi target mod

.

Investigative
Existing

Faction check - Sheriff, Paladin, Observer, King, Seeker, Psychic
Night Visit check - Observer, Night-watch, Princess
Class check - Marchal, Nightwatch, Soulcatcher
Class type check - Princess, Seeker, MM, Soulcatcher
Royal blood check - King
Killer class check - Phys
Day ability user check - Night-watch
Investigator list check (is it on an arbitrary list of classes?) - Inquisitor

Possible New

Immunity check
Bug (See what target is effected by)
Retroactive visit check
Parity cop check
Hidden effects reveal
Day ability target check (Checks to see who is the target of day abilitys)
Complete day ability check (Checks to see the user, target, and the ability of a day ability)
Day cop (check faction/class/class type in the day)
Copy results (get the targets ability feedback)
Test (Get the hypothetical feedback from a target if he selected a given player)
Inverse test (Get the hypothetical feedback the target would get if the first target targeted him)
Class visit check (What classes visited target)
Uses check (how meny limited use Ability’s does the target have?)
Used Ability check (Did the target use their secondary ability or thier first?)

.

Offensive

Debuffs/Ability manipulation

Existing

Targeted Occupy - Butler, Drunk, Servant, invoker
Visitor dependent Occupy - Butler, Servant
Redirect to user- Sage
Redirect to self - Drunk, Alchaholic
Redirect to other - Invoker, Herbalist
Target Swap - CW, Sage, Ritualist, Scorned
Night Immunity removal - Drunk, Alchaholic
Occupy Immunity removal - Drunk, Alchaholic
Forced day ability usage - Knight, Enforcer
Day ability prevention - Invoker
Day ability redirect - CW

Possible New

Royal blood removal
Poison immunity removal
Class redirect (redirect a spacific class)
Class Occupy
Trait dependent Occupy
Trait dependent redirect
Action dependent Occupy/Redirect

Read full topic
